title: Stephanie Zavala
text:
This is my digital workspace.
I’m Stephanie, a veterinarian and MSc Epidemiology student exploring the intersection of public health, data, and innovation.



Research | Experience

title: Stephanie Zavala
text: Hello, I’m Stephanie. I’m a veterinarian currently completing a Master’s in Epidemiology. This website is my portfolio, where I share my background, current work, and interests.

title: Stephanie Zavala
text:
Overview
🎓 MSc Epidemiology, University of Basel - Swiss TPH (2026)
🧬 Thesis: Modeling how human and environmental dynamics affect tick-borne diseases in Switzerland
📊 Focused on data driven approaches in public health, zoonoses, and One Health systems
💻 Core tools: R, GitHub, Data Cleaning and Analysis
🧠 Innovation stack: AI tools, API integrations, prototyping for research

title: About
text:
Beyond the lab

I love creating
✐ Projects, apps, building MVPs or just blogging vet content.


Tech + Learning = Playground
⚙︎ Vibe coding, exploring new tools, or getting lost in a labyrinth of AI APIs and data.


The Outdoors
I’ll take mosquito bites if it means peace, clarity, and a good adventure.


Brain Recharge
Late 90s human. I’m into films, pop culture, CDs, film photos & park backgammon ☺︎

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
🎓 Education
MSc Epidemiology
University of Basel, Switzerland
> Thesis: Environmental and anthropogenic factors influencing tick-borne diseases
Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (MVZ in Mexico)
Autonomous University of the State of Hidalgo, Mexico
> Fieldwork: Rabies campaigns, livestock and clinical practice, field data collection

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
🌍 Field & Clinical Experience
Veterinarian
Mexico & USA
> Clinical work in small animal practice with One Health lens.
> Experience across urban, rural, and cross-border contexts.
Field Assistant
> Rabies mass vaccination programs, livestock care, rural data collection.
> Developed early interest in disease prevention and epidemiology.

title: Projects
text:
Project Table










Project
Status
Type
Tools / Skills
Summary




One Health in Mongolia
📝 Under revision
Research
Annex development, data integration, scientific writing
Co-author. Linking Mongolian data indicators to ecosystem health and sustainability.


Tick-borne Disease in Switzerland
🔄 In progress
Thesis
Scientific writng, research protocol, RStudio, spatial analysis
MSc thesis on climate + human activity impacts on disease risk.


Modeling Influenza Epidemics
✅ Completed
Learning
R, SEIR models, data viz
Simulated influenza outbreaks and visualized epidemic curves.


Data Cleaning
🟡 Ongoing learning process
Practice
R, QA, reproducibility, documentation
Real world pipeline for messy research datasets.


VetNota: AI Assistant
🛠️ In development
Personal
Whisper API, UX, mobile dev, product mgmt
MVP app for audio transcription and diagnostic notes for veterinarians.


Disinfectant Resistance to Giardia spp.
📝 Under revision
Research
Lab data, scientific writing, research protocol
Undergraduate co-authored paper on disinfectant resistance in vet clinics (Mexico).


Scoping Review for systematic review
🟡 Ongoing
Review
Scoping review, Data extraction
Assisting with a systematic review about sexual violence in war.


Data Support for PhD Thesis
🟡 Starts Aug 2025
Collaboration
R, cleaning, exploratory analysis
Volunteer assistant on external PhD research project. Data focused.
